ComicInfo.Summary:
A reluctant partnership is forged between R.A.G.E.'s Revere and Citadel and his Hard Corps in order to capture the X-O armor. This time the battlefield is Donovan's home of Denver. As destruction ensues, a secret government investigation threatens the entire Manowar operation.

ComicInfo.Title: Things to do in Denver when you're Deadly!
